title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the AtmosphericWaterHarvester project, including functional and non-functional requirements, target users, and use cases.

title: Design System Architecture for Atmospheric Water Harvester
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the water extraction mechanism, renewable energy integration, control systems, data management, and user interfaces. Ensure modularity, scalability, maintainability, security, and performance aspects are considered. Define the system components, their interactions, and the data flow. Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies. Propose a deployment strategy, infrastructure requirements, and edge cases/error handling considerations. Provide documentation for each component and their interfaces, as well as guidelines for future updates and expansions. Once completed, perform code review and testing to ensure adherence to standards. Update the rfc_state to 'COMPLETED' upon task fulfillment.

title: Develop Water Extraction Module
description: Implement the core functionality of extracting water from the atmosphere, including any necessary hardware components and control algorithms.

title: Integrate Renewable Energy Sources
description: Design and implement the integration of renewable energy sources (e.g., solar, wind) to power the water extraction process.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for monitoring and controlling the AtmosphericWaterHarvester device.

title: Implement Data Storage and Analytics
description: Design and implement a data storage solution for logging device operations and performance metrics, and integrate analytics capabilities for monitoring and optimization.

title: Develop Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure the device's integrity and protect user data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the AtmosphericWaterHarvester software components.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the proper functioning and reliability of the AtmosphericWaterHarvester device.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Prepare detailed technical documentation, including user manuals, installation guides, and maintenance procedures for the AtmosphericWaterHarvester device.
